response.overview: Ten years ago, Zhang Lu, the young marshal of the Dashaifu Manor, was mysteriously murdered. While guarding the wake, the servant saw the coffin lid open by itself, and a puppet hand reached out from the coffin, frightening everyone away. However, when they returned to the wake, they found that the coffin lid had not moved. Meanwhile, in the inner room, the commander of the manor was quietly approached by a puppet smoking a cigarette, and he died on the spot. Since then, the manor has declined.  Ten years later, a stage actor named Shi Jia obtained a rare puppet. Since the puppet came to his home, Shi Jia's girlfriend, Yu Bi, has often seen the puppet's figure in various corners of the house, although the puppet has not moved. She thought she was having hallucinations until Shi Jia was hung from the ceiling like a puppet and died mysteriously.
response.title: Ling Ou
